Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to the alternative veterans property tax exemption
Summary: Relates to the alternative veterans property tax exemption; authorizes active members of the military to apply for such exemption.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the alternative veterans property tax exemption
